title: How to Use the Wii Controller

steps.title: Once you've set up your Wii, pick which game you're going to play.
steps.content: Once you've set up your Wii, pick which game you're going to play.

steps.title: Make sure that the sensor is on top of your TV set or in front of the area where you want to be while playing.
steps.content: Make sure that the sensor is on top of your TV set or in front of the area where you want to be while playing.

steps.title: To manipulate the controller on the screen, point the controller to a point on the screen, and a corresponding icon will appear where you are pointing, and you will be able to move it by simply moving the remote, and pointing at different locations on the screen.
